extensionDescription.message: Makes managing bookmarks easier by organizing them into folders based on keywords provided by the user.

unsortDialogText.message: This will delete all sorted folders moving the bookmarks they contain to one of the default folders.
unsortDialogText.description: Main text on the flatten dialog

unsortAccept.description: Text of OK button on the flatten dialog

unsortReject.description: Text of cancel button on the flatten dialog

sortDialogText.message: Create tags to sort your bookmarks.
sortDialogText.description: Main text on the sort dialog

inputHelper.message: Type comma separated keywords and press Enter
inputHelper.description: Helper text above the input on sorting dialog

sortInput.description: Text of placeholder of input on the sorting dialog

sortGo.description: Text of action button on the sorting dialog
